main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Annapolis, Maryland in 1950, including bright lights moving rapidly in the sky and a round, saucer-shaped object sighted by military personnel.
interesting points: The sightings included descriptions of bright lights flashing on and off, moving rapidly across the sky.
One report described a saucer-shaped object with a red-silver-polished surface and a slow humming or throbbing noise.
Witnesses observed the objects maneuvering rapidly, including performing rapid up and down maneuvers and disappearing when turning.
A separate report mentioned a bright, round, red-orange light moving rapidly in all directions for several minutes before disappearing.
A follow-up investigation confirmed the landing of a silver, round object in a field, witnessed by military and civilian personnel.
sighted object: bright lights and round, saucer-shaped object
